examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Companies House to tell me about number
Alexa, ask Companies House for information on number
Alexa, tell me the officers in company number from Companies House
en-GB.name: companies house
en-GB.description: Want to know your accounting and confirmation statement due dates? Alexa knows, Just say: Alexa, ask company house to tell me about <Company Number>. Want to know who the officers are of that company? Alexa, ask companies house who are the appointments of <Company Number>
